languages.text: "Ничто не случайно. Нити вюрда моя и моих братьев сплетены плотно, и в том, что встреча наша приблизилась, я вижу волю Черногрива. Отыщем их, эттфатер — этого желает судьба".

"Everything has a reason. The threads of my and my brothers' wyrds are tied together. I see Blackmane's will in our meeting finally approaching. Let us find them, Aett-Vater, for such is our destiny's wish."
languages.original_text: "Ничто не случайно. Нити вюрда моя и моих братьев сплетены плотно, и в том, что встреча наша приблизилась, я вижу волю Черногрива. Отыщем их, эттфатер — этого желает судьба".

traits.locale_text: "Everything has a reason. My thread of wyrd and those of my brothers are intertwined tightly, and in our encounter finally taking place I see the Blackmane's will. Let's find them, aett-vater, this is our destiny's wish."

"Everything has a reason. My thread of wyrd and those of my brothers are intertwined tightly, and in our encounter finally taking place I see the Blackmane's will. Let's find them, aett-vater, this is our destiny's wish."

"Everything has a reason. My thread of wyrd and those of my brethren are intertwined tightly. I see the Blackmane's will in our encounter finally taking place. Let's find them, Aett-vater, this is our destiny's wish."

"Everything has a reason. My thread of wyrd and those of my brethren are intertwined tightly. I see the Blackmane's will in our encounter finally taking place. Let's find them, Aett-vater, this is our destiny's wish."

"Everything has a reason. The threads of my and my brothers' wyrds are tied together. I see Blackmane's will in our meeting finally approaching. Let us find them, Aett-Vater, for such is our destiny's wish."

languages.text: “凡事都有原因，我的命运之线与我兄弟们的命运之线紧紧缠绕在一起。我们之所以会来到这个地方，一定是出于黑鬃的意愿。我们去找到他们吧，狼领，这就是命运的安排。”
languages.original_text: "Everything has a reason. The threads of my and my brothers' wyrds are tied together. I see Blackmane's will in our meeting finally approaching. Let us find them, Aett-Vater, for such is our destiny's wish."

traits.locale_text: “凡事都有原因，我的命运之线与我兄弟们的命运之线紧紧缠绕在一起。我们之所以会来到这个地方，一定是出于黑鬃的意愿。我们去找到他们吧，狼领，这就是命运的安排。”

languages.text: « Chaque chose a sa raison d'être. Les fils de mon wyrd sont étroitement liés à ceux de mes frères. C'est la volonté de la Crinière Noire que notre rencontre advienne prochainement. Trouvons-les, aett-vater, telle est notre destinée. »
languages.original_text: "Everything has a reason. The threads of my and my brothers' wyrds are tied together. I see Blackmane's will in our meeting finally approaching. Let us find them, Aett-Vater, for such is our destiny's wish."

traits.locale_text: « Chaque chose a sa raison d'être. Les fils de mon wyrd sont étroitement liés à ceux de mes frères. C'est la volonté de la Crinière Noire que notre rencontre advienne prochainement. Trouvons-les, aett-vater, telle est notre destinée. »

languages.text: "Alles hat seinen Grund. Meine Wyrd-Fäden und die meiner Brüder sind miteinander verbunden. Ich erkenne Schwarzmähnes Wille in der Tatsache, dass unsere Begegnung endlich naht. Lasst sie uns finden, Aett-Vater, denn unser Schicksal wünscht es."
languages.original_text: "Everything has a reason. The threads of my and my brothers' wyrds are tied together. I see Blackmane's will in our meeting finally approaching. Let us find them, Aett-Vater, for such is our destiny's wish."

traits.locale_text: "Alles hat seinen Grund. Meine Wyrd-Fäden und die meiner Brüder sind miteinander verbunden. Ich erkenne Schwarzmähnes Wille in der Tatsache, dass unsere Begegnung endlich naht. Lasst sie uns finden, Aett-Vater, denn unser Schicksal wünscht es."

languages.text: «Todo ocurre por una razón. Los hilos de mi destino y los de mis hermanos están fuertemente entrelazados. La inminencia de nuestro encuentro es la voluntad de Melenanegra. Debemos buscarlos, Aett-Vater, pues ese es nuestro cometido».
languages.original_text: "Everything has a reason. The threads of my and my brothers' wyrds are tied together. I see Blackmane's will in our meeting finally approaching. Let us find them, Aett-Vater, for such is our destiny's wish."

traits.locale_text: «Todo ocurre por una razón. Los hilos de mi destino y los de mis hermanos están fuertemente entrelazados. La inminencia de nuestro encuentro es la voluntad de Melenanegra. Debemos buscarlos, Aett-Vater, pues ese es nuestro cometido».

languages.text: 「全てには理由がある。俺と兄弟たちは運命の糸で結ばれている。ブラックメインの意志がいよいよ近づいているのが分かる。彼らを見つけようではないか、アエット＝ヴァテル。それが我々の運命だ」
languages.original_text: "Everything has a reason. The threads of my and my brothers' wyrds are tied together. I see Blackmane's will in our meeting finally approaching. Let us find them, Aett-Vater, for such is our destiny's wish."

traits.locale_text: 「全てには理由がある。俺と兄弟たちは運命の糸で結ばれている。ブラックメインの意志がいよいよ近づいているのが分かる。彼らを見つけようではないか、アエット＝ヴァテル。それが我々の運命だ」

languages.text: "Her şeyin bir sebebi vardır. Benim ve kardeşlerimin kader ağları birbirine bağlı. Karayele'yle nihayet buluşacağız. Bulalım onları Aett-Vater, kaderimiz böyle ister."
languages.original_text: "Everything has a reason. The threads of my and my brothers' wyrds are tied together. I see Blackmane's will in our meeting finally approaching. Let us find them, Aett-Vater, for such is our destiny's wish."
